title: deleting a user redirects to a non-existing page
body_html: When you delete a user (either as an organiser or, I'm guessing, as a user trying to delete your own profile, if that's a possible use case), you get redirected to /users which does not exist anymore (i.e. visitor gets a 404). The visitor should probably get redirected to /community instead, which is the “new” user list page.
